verses.verse: In the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of the <S%H4467>reign<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> came this <S%H1697>word<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to <S%H6213>me:<s%> Make <S%H4147>bonds<s%> and <S%H4133>bars,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> them on your <S%H6677>neck;<s%>

and <S%H7971>send<s%> them to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H123>Edom,<s%> and to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the children of <S%H1121>Ammon,<s%> and to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre,<s%> and to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6721>Sidon,<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> who <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%>

and give them a <S%H6680>command<s%> to their <S%H113>masters,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> You shall <S%H559>tell<s%> your <S%H113>masters:<s%>

I have <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> the <S%H120>men<s%> and the <S%H929>animals<s%> that are <S%H6440>on<s%> the surface of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> by my <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>power<s%> and by my <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H2220>arm;<s%> and I <S%H5414>give<s%> it to whom it <S%H5869>seems<s%> right to <S%H3474>me.<s%>

Now have I <S%H5414>given<s%> all these <S%H776>lands<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> my <S%H5650>servant;<s%> and the <S%H2416>animals<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> also have I <S%H5414>given<s%> him to serve <S%H5647>him.<s%>

All the <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H1121>him,<s%> and his son, and his <S%H1121>son<s%>'s <S%H1121>son,<s%> until the <S%H6256>time<s%> of his own <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H935>come:<s%> and then <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> and <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> shall make him their <S%H5647>bondservant.<s%>

It shall <S%H1471>happen,<s%> that the nation and the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> which will not <S%H5647>serve<s%> the same <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and that will not <S%H5414>put<s%> their <S%H6677>neck<s%> under the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> that <S%H1471>nation<s%> will I <S%H6485>punish,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and with the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and with the <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> until I have <S%H8552>consumed<s%> them by his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

But as for <S%H8085>you,<s%> don't you listen to your <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> nor to your <S%H7080>diviners,<s%> nor to your <S%H2472>dreams,<s%> nor to your <S%H6049>soothsayers,<s%> nor to your <S%H3786>sorcerers,<s%> who <S%H559>speak<s%> to <S%H559>you,<s%> saying, You shall not <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon:<s%>
for they <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> a <S%H8267>lie<s%> to <S%H7368>you,<s%> to remove you far from your <S%H127>land,<s%> and that I should drive you <S%H5080>out,<s%> and you should <S%H6>perish.<s%>

But the <S%H1471>nation<s%> that shall <S%H935>bring<s%> their <S%H6677>neck<s%> under the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3240>him,<s%> that nation will I let remain in their own <S%H127>land,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and they shall <S%H5647>till<s%> <S%H3427>it,<s%> and dwell therein.

I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> according to all these <S%H1697>words,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H935>Bring<s%> your <S%H6677>necks<s%> under the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> him and his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H2421>live.<s%>

Why will you <S%H4191>die,<s%> you and your <S%H5971>people,<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> by the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and by the <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> concerning the <S%H1471>nation<s%> that will not <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon?<s%>

<S%H8085>Don't<s%> listen to the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> who <S%H559>speak<s%> to <S%H559>you,<s%> saying, You shall not <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon;<s%> for they <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> a lie to <S%H8267>you.<s%>

For I have not <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H5002>them,<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> but they <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H8267>falsely<s%> in my <S%H8034>name;<s%> that I may drive you <S%H5080>out,<s%> and that you may <S%H6>perish,<s%> <S%H5030>you,<s%> and the prophets who prophesy to <S%H5012>you.<s%>

Also I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and to all this <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H8085>Don't<s%> listen to the <S%H1697>words<s%> of your <S%H5030>prophets<s%> who <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> to <S%H559>you,<s%> saying, <S%H3627>Behold,<s%> the vessels of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> shall now <S%H4120>shortly<s%> be brought <S%H7725>again<s%> from <S%H894>Babylon;<s%> for they <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> a lie to <S%H8267>you.<s%>
<S%H8085>Don't<s%> listen to <S%H5647>them;<s%> serve the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H2421>live:<s%> why should this <S%H5892>city<s%> become a <S%H2723>desolation?<s%>

But if they be <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> and if the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3426>be<s%> with <S%H6293>them,<s%> let them now make intercession to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> that the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> which are <S%H3498>left<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and at <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H935>don't<s%> go to <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> concerning the <S%H5982>pillars,<s%> and concerning the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and concerning the <S%H4350>bases,<s%> and concerning the <S%H3499>residue<s%> of the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> that are <S%H3498>left<s%> in this <S%H5892>city,<s%>

which <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H3947>didn't<s%> take, when he carried away <S%H1540>captive<s%> <S%H3204>Jeconiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and all the <S%H2715>nobles<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%>

<S%H559>yes,<s%> thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> concerning the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> that are <S%H3498>left<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and at <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%>

They shall be <S%H935>carried<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and there shall they <S%H3117>be,<s%> until the day that I <S%H6485>visit<s%> <S%H5002>them,<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> then will I <S%H5927>bring<s%> them <S%H7725>up,<s%> and restore them to this <S%H4725>place.<s%>
